item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: 1x Sidebar Left
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_position="first"] [vc_column] [vc_column_text el_position="first last"]

Powerful Admin Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row] [vc_row] [vc_column] [imageeffect image="3212" type="frame" width="240" height="240" align="alignright" alt="powerful admin options" lightbox="yes" target="_self" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"] DynamiX has incredibly powerful admin options to help you setup your website exactly how you need it, minimising the need to add custom code. For example, the Header Settings page allows you to control the menu alignment and branding alignment. The alignment can be set globally and on each individual page. There is also the ability to control the position of the menu and branding, disable the branding and control the header height. Some other admin options include; skin settings, header infobar, number of footer / drop panel columns, favicon, blog settings, social media, number of sidebars, breadcrumbs + so much more. [/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row] [vc_row] [vc_column] [vc_column_text el_position="first last"]

Gallery Media Options

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row] [vc_row el_position="last"] [vc_column] [imageeffect image="3210" type="frame" width="240" height="240" align="alignright" alt="attached media method" lightbox="yes" target="_self" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"] DynamiX has several methods of inserting media into the galleries. This allows you to separate gallery media from normal blog posts. These methods include; slide sets attached media gallery media posts blog posts flickr sets * wp e-Commerce products * * These options require activation within the admin before the option becomes available. The fastest method of inserting media into galleries is the attached media option. Simply assign your media to a gallery media post or even a normal page, post and then enter the ID of that post / page into the gallery datasource. Extra functionality has been added to the media uploader to include video urls and custom links.

Plugin Integration

DynamiX is designed to integrate with BuddyPress, bbPress, Woocommerce and WP e-Commerce WordPress plugins - simply install the plugins and the Theme will recognise they are active and initiate functions and styling. Each plugin has specific styling and functions to help integrate, for example - wp e-Commerce, all products can be inserted into any of the galleries. DynamiX is designed to be as compatible as possible with all plugins.

Translation Ready

Terus is translation ready with the required .po / .mo files needed for translating into your language. These files will work with the WPML and Codestyling Localization wordpress plugins. [/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row]

item.title: Powerful Skin Options
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_position="first"] [vc_column] [vc_column_text el_position="first"]

Skin Settings

DynamiX includes 21 stunning skin pre-sets, but also allows you to create your own skins easily with the powerful Skin Settings admin page. [/vc_column_text] [imageeffect image="3208" type="frame" width="260" height="260" align="alignright" lightbox="yes" target="_self"] [list style="orb" color="grey-lite" el_position="last"] The Skin Settings admin page allows you to modify, duplicate and create new skin sets. The powerful options allows you to create the ideal skin for you website design. Below is a list of options available;
  • Choose Light or Dark elements
  • Select from two different branding versions
  • Set font size, main, heading, menu font type
  • Control font, link and heading colours
  • Set upto 2 background layers for the Header / Footer
  • Choose from the following background options for Body area;Color / Gradient Image Fullscreen Image Positioned Pattern Video / Flash Image / Video Cycle
  • Control the opacity value of each layer
[/list] [/vc_column] [/vc_row] [vc_row] [vc_column] [vc_column_text el_position="first last"]

Custom Fonts

[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row] [vc_row el_position="last"] [vc_column] [imageeffect image="3213" type="frame" width="260" height="260" align="alignright" lightbox="yes" target="_self" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"] Select from a list of stunning pre-selected google or cufon fonts. With google fonts you can assign them to body text, headings and the menu. If you're not content with the pre-selected list, you can even add  your own fonts via the General Settings page. Simply pick your font from google font library or download a cufon javascript file and upload to your media library. [/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row]

item.title: Stage
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_position="first last" el_class="wide-row"][vc_column width="1/2"][postgallery_image id="stageone" data_source="data-4" slidesetid="slideset_demo_b" width="675" imageeffect="shadowblackwhite" animation="toss" tween="easeInOutBack" el_position="first" orderby="ASC" flickr_set="No username entered"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text el_position="last"]

Stage gallery shortcode

Choose from 5 image effects None, Frame, Shadow, Reflection and Shadow & Reflection. Select from 28 transition effects and 31 animation tweening options. The stage gallery can adapt to the size of your images and NOT squish them. Plus add lightbox option, slide timeout and title overlays  and supports video. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Grid Gallery
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_class="wide-row"][vc_column width="1/2"][postgallery_grid id="stageone" data_source="data-4" attached_id="1673" slidesetid="slideset_demo_b" content_type="titleoverlay" width="675" imageeffect="shadowreflection" imgwidth="132" el_position="first" orderby="ASC" flickr_set="No username entered" align="aligncenter" imgheight="132"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Grid gallery shortcode

This gallery can be inserted through Visual Composer. Select upto 12 Columns. Choose from 5 image effects None, Frame, Shadow, Reflection and Shadow & Reflection. Fix the image dimensions or set one value and let the other be auto. Plus add lightbox option, animated category filtering. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_position="first last" el_class="wide-row"][vc_column width="1/2"][postgallery_islider id="stageone" data_source="data-4" attached_id="1673" slidesetid="slideset_demo_b" width="675" height="370" imageeffect="shadow" el_position="first"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text el_position="last"]

iSlider gallery shortcode

Add a Shadow effect. Select from 28 transition effects and 31 animation tweening options. The iSlider gallery can adapt to the size of your images and NOT squish them. Plus add lightbox option, slide timeout and title overlays and supports video. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: 3d Gallery
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: [vc_row el_position="first last"] [vc_column] [blockquote type="blockquote_line" align="left" el_position="first"] The 3d Slider has numerous settings to help you achieve the perfect setup for your images. [/blockquote] [vc_column_text el_position="last"] Choose from an extensive list of options to control the slide transitions. Also allows title / text overlay and links. Current settings are Pieces:6, Transition: easeOutBack, Transition Time:2.6, Delay:0.1, Depth Offset:600, Cube Distance:40. [/vc_column_text] [/vc_column] [/vc_row]

item.title: faqs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_position="first last"] [vc_column] [styledbox type="general" el_position="first"] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="grey-lite" text="Q" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Is this Theme use modern standards like HTML5, CSS3 etc?
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="teal-lite" text="A" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Yes, it's HTML5, CSS3, Responsive and Retina Ready!
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [/styledbox] [styledbox type="general_shaded"] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="grey-lite" text="Q" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Can I disable the Gallery on the home page?
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="teal-lite" text="A" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Yes, add / remove ANY Gallery on ANY page.
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [/styledbox] [styledbox type="general"] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="grey-lite" text="Q" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Can I change the features on the home page?
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="teal-lite" text="A" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Yes, using powerful the powerful visual page builder & page options.
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [/styledbox] [styledbox type="general_shaded"] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="grey-lite" text="Q" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Can I change the link colors, fonts, background etc?
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="teal-lite" text="A" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Yes, edit or create new skins using the LIVE skin customizer.
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [/styledbox] [styledbox type="general"] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="grey-lite" text="Q" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Is this Theme BuddyPress compatible?
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="teal-lite" text="A" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Yes, as well as bbPress ( standalone ).
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [/styledbox] [styledbox type="general_shaded" el_position="last"] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="grey-lite" text="Q" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Is this Theme e-Commerce?
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [vc_column_inner width="1/2"] [dropcap style="two" color="teal-lite" text="A" el_position="first"] [vc_column_text el_position="last"]
Yes, using Woocommerce or WP e-Commerce + add products to the galleries.
[/vc_column_text] [/vc_column_inner] [/styledbox] [/vc_column] [/vc_row]

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row padding="40px 0 25px 0"][vc_column width="1/4"][icon iconcolor="inherit" align="center" name="fa-magic" iconsize="xx-large"][vc_column_text]

UNLIMITED SKINS

Select from the built-in skins or create your own, completely bespoke skin. Choose the font type, colors, size and much more.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][icon iconcolor="inherit" align="center" name="fa-gears" iconsize="xx-large"][vc_column_text]

POWERFUL ADMIN

Most themes only have options you can set globally, DynamiX goes a step further to allow custom options on individual pages too.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][icon iconcolor="inherit" align="center" name="fa-th-list" iconsize="xx-large"][vc_column_text]

PAGE BUILDER

Build complex layouts within minutes using the powerful visual page builder system, drag & drop elements onto a page and edit / add content fast![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4"][icon iconcolor="inherit" align="center" name="fa-arrows-alt" iconsize="xx-large"][vc_column_text]

FULLY RESPONSIVE

DynamiX is 100% fully responsive and looks incredible on all devices. This includes all content and sliders too, with the option to disable.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="custom" bg_image="3577" parallax="yes" padding="90px 0 85px 0" font_color="#ffffff" wide_row="yes" margin_bottom="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

Parallax & Custom Rows

add any content within the rows
[/vc_column_text][divider_line type="divider_blank"][divider_line type="divider_blank"][postgallery_grid id="grid_parallax" data_source="data-4" orderby="ASC" flickr_set="No username entered" slidesetid="Unsplash Set" content_type="image" align="aligncenter" imgwidth="300" imgheight="250" lightbox="yes" height="270"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row custom_background="custom" bg_color="#00adae" font_color="#ffffff" parallax="yes" wide_row="yes"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]

[icon name="fa-comments" iconsize="medium" iconcolor="#333" background="false" backgroundcolor="" ] FREE SUPPORT & UPDATES

You only have to take a glance at the changelog to see you're making a great investment. If you can't find an answer via the documentation or screencasts, the Help Center provides fast, reliable support, completely FREE as we care as much about your site as you.[/vc_column_text][divider_line type="divider_blank"][vc_column_text css_animation="left-to-right"]

[icon name="fa-globe" iconsize="medium" iconcolor="#333" background="false" backgroundcolor="" ] MULTILINGUAL

DynamiX includes the required .po & .mo files ready for translation. Easily translate using the Codestyling Localization plugin, plus support for WPML & qTranslate for multi-language support.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

[icon name="fa-bar-chart-o" iconsize="medium" iconcolor="#333" background="false" backgroundcolor="" ] SEO READY

Built with SEO in mind, the site is optimized for on-screen SEO and incorporates the best practices for optimizing page load speed. Works great with SEO plugins such as Yoast & popular caching plugins too, which will boost your organic rank within the search engines.[/vc_column_text][divider_line type="divider_blank"][vc_column_text css_animation="right-to-left"]

[icon name="fa-tasks" iconsize="medium" iconcolor="#333" background="false" backgroundcolor="" ] PARALLAX & COLOR ROWS

DynamiX now includes the ability to customize and add parallax to rows within Visual Composer. With the easy to use options, you can transform a page and add effects within seconds![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_position="last" padding="40px 0 25px 0"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_accordion el_position="first last" el_class="wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_bottom-to-top wpb_start_animation"][vc_accordion_tab title="Powerful" color="grey-lite"][vc_column_text el_position="first"] DynamiX is incredibly flexible, build your pages exactly how you want, using the powerful visual composer and page options. [/vc_column_text][button title="FAQ's" type="droppanelbutton" color="grey-lite" align="alignright" target="_self"][vc_column_text el_position="last"] See the FAQ section to answer some of your questions. [/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Why DynamiX?" color="grey-lite"][list style="check" color="green-lite" el_position="first last"]
  • Responsive Design
  • HTML5 / CSS3
  • BuddyPress / bbPress /  Woocommerce / WP e-Commerce plugin integration
  • Built-in Gallery Media Manager
  • Powerful Page Builder ( Visual Composer )
  • LIVE Skin Customizer ( with 21 pre-sets )
  • Unlimited Colors + Image / Slideshow / Video background options
  • Dedicated Support Forum
  • + So Much More!
[/list][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title="Make Contact" color="grey-lite"][vc_column_text el_position="first"] If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. Please note no support is given via the contact formuse the dedicated support forum. [/vc_column_text][button title="Make Contact" type="droppanelbutton" color="grey-lite" target="_self" el_position="last"][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

PACKED WITH AWESOME FEATURES
